summary: A famous poet who hasn't written a word in two years unconsciously plagiarizes the work of Stefan George, while dealing with several mistresses, his dim-witted brother, and a murder investigation.
cast: Kurt Raab|Margit Carstensen|Helen Vita|Volker Spengler|Ingrid Caven|Y Sa Lo|Ulli Lommel|Armin Meier|Katherina Buchhammer|Vitus Zeplichal|Brigitte Mira|Hannes Kaetner|Peter Chatel|Heli Finkenzeller|Marquard Bohm|Christiane Maybach|Nino Korda|Adrian Hoven|Elke Aberle|Alexander Allerson|Ellen Eckelmann|Katren Gebelein|Hannes Gromball|Wolfgang Hess|Sonja Neudorfer|Michael Octave|Helmut Petigk|Dieter Schidor|Michael Stippel|Monica Teuber
